div.script:
$(document).ready(function () {
        var logConsole = function (str) {
            console.log(str);
        };
        if ($('#tabPortlet_420161 .divTabEdit').val() == "True") {
            var isModern = ('True');
            if(isModern.toLowerCase() == "true")
            {
                var tabObj = $('#tabPortlet_420161 ');
                var tabM = $('#ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ctl32_divTabs').attr('portlet') == 'tab';

                function activate() {
                    $(tabObj).scrollingTabs({                 
                        tabs: [{"paneId":"ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ctl32_divTabs_0","title":"For Students","content":"\n    
Schoology-Student Login\n    
Accelerated Reader\n    
Destiny Library\n    
Discovery Education\n    
Google Drive\n    
iReady\n    
Microsoft Office 365\n    
PowerSchool- Student Login\n    
Read Naturally\n    
The PawPrint - Student Newspaper\n    
Safari Montage\n    
Smart Futures\n    
Sports Schedules\n    
Study Island\n","active":false,"disabled":false},{"paneId":"ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ctl32_divTabs_1","title":"For Parents","content":"For Parents\n\n    
Applications:\n    \n        
PowerSchool Parent Access\n        
School Cafe\n        
Schoology Parent Login\n    \n    \n    
School Bulletins \n    \n        
Elementary School Bulletin\n        
Middle/High School Bulletin\n    \n    \n    
Technology Instructions\n    \n        
PowerSchool Account Creation\n        
Parent Teacher Organization\n        
School Cafe Account Creation\n        
Schoology Account Creation\n    \n    \n    
Student Registration\n    
Homeless Information\n","active":false,"disabled":false},{"paneId":"ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ctl32_divTabs_2","title":"For Staff","content":"\n    
Applications:\n    \n        
Discovery Education\n        
Email and Office 365\n        
Google Apps\n        
PowerSchool - Teacher Portal\n        
PowerSchool - admin portal\n        
Safari Montage\n        
Schoology\n        
Spam Filter\n        
Web Help Desk\n    \n    \n\n\n    
HR:\n    \n        
Act 48\n        
Employee Portal - username is lowercase\n        
Intranet\n        
PVAAS\n        
Safe Schools\n    \n    \n","active":false,"disabled":false},{"paneId":"ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ctl32_divTabs_3","title":"From The Superintendent","content":"
\"Welcome to Greenwood School District!\n
\nThe Greenwood School District values open and interactive communication with our community members. Our close knit community works collaboratively towards the best interest of all students. Our website serves to provide news and information to keep stakeholders aware of school district happenings.
\n
\nPlease feel free to explore the different components associated with our website. It is our hope that you will be informed about numerous aspects of Greenwood School District. Our mission is \" to provide enriching, educational experiences for each individual student. We believe the foundation of these experiences is a partnership among the family, school, and community.\" We are excited to further enhance our personalized learning through a 1:1 technology environment coupled with effective and engaging instructional practices. This is an enriching process for our staff and students. We envision a personalized student experience supported by career pathways and diverse educational endeavors.
\n
\nIf you have a question and/or concern you would like to address, please feel free to call my office at (717) 589-3117 or email to nguarente@greenwoodsd.org.
\n
\nYours truly,
\n
\nNicholas Guarente, Ed.D.","active":false,"disabled":false}],// required,
                        propPaneId: 'paneId', // optional - pass in default value for demo purposes
                        propTitle: 'title', // optional - pass in default value for demo purposes
                        propActive: 'active', // optional - pass in default value for demo purposes
                        propDisabled: 'disabled', // optional - pass in default value for demo purposes
                        propContent: 'content', // optional - pass in default value for demo purposes
                        tabMode : tabM,
                        scrollToTabEdge: false, // optional - pass in default value for demo purposes
                        disableScrollArrowsOnFullyScrolled: false // optional- pass in default value for demo purposes
                    }).on('ready.scrtabs', function() {
                        $('#'+this.id+' .tab-pane').attr('tabindex',0);
                    });
                };

                activate();
            }
        }
    });
